version_description:
> Hi there Miraculous players. We’ve made some bug fixes so your game (and Ladybug) will run smoother than ever.
> Loving Miraculous Ladybug? Leave us a review and tell us what you think (feel free to hit that 5 stars button while you’re at it).

> The only bug allowed in this game is the one and only Ladybug! We got rid of all imposter bugs.
> Supervillain face-offs just got even more intense! Get ready for some seriously challenging battles.
> Having fun saving Paris? Leave us a review.

> This game runs just like Cat Noir! (fast and smooth, get it?!)
> Thanks for playing! Tell us what you think by leaving us a review.
> Still here?! Go save Paris!

> Hey there, Paris-savers! Enjoy a smoother-than-ever game, so you can concentrate on your rescue mission!
> How much do you LOVE this game? Rate us!

> Ladybug doesn’t fraternize with other bugs! We kicked all the unwelcome bugs out of Paris.
> We improved the game so you can race smoothly through the streets of Paris!

> Hold your whiskers! Is that a bug? Not on Ladybug’s watch! She destroyed all the bugs (other than herself, of course…).
> Having fun saving Paris? Let everyone know - leave us a review!

> Game improvements to make Ladybug and Cat Noir run faster than ever!
> Bug fixes - Ladybug likes to keep her beloved city clean!
> Revised privacy policies due to regulatory changes.

> Update now to enjoy graphic improvements & bug fixes.
> Like us on Facebook so you don't miss out on any upcoming games: facebook.com/tabtale
> Can't get enough of this game? C'mon, give us a 5 star rating.

> Who needs annoying things like bugs getting in the way when you’re trying to focus on saving Paris?! We got rid of them!
> Want to know what other awesome games we’ve got for you? Like us on Facebook.com/TabTale
> Revised privacy policies due to regulatory changes. While we were at it - we've made some gameplay improvements and bug fixes. Have fun!

> Beat your most miraculous score! Now you can see your high score in the game's infinite levels. Compare with friends, and be the best superhero you can be!
> Run smoothly through the City of Love - we made game improvements so you can enjoy your rescue adventure more than ever.
> How many stars do you think Ladybug is worth? Rate the game!

> Guess who’s joining Miraculous Ladybug and Cat Noir?! You’ll probably recognize her by her marvelous tail and magic flute - it’s Rena Rouge, the miraculous fox!
> Now saving Paris is even more fun!
> Let us know what you think about this awesome game by leaving a review :-)

> We defeated some gross bugs for you. Now do your part, and go defeat the evil supervillains! The Parisians are counting on you!
> Show your love for Ladybug by giving us a 5-star rating!

> NEW! Choose your favorite hero and save the city! From now on, you can play any level with any character you love!
> Levels now load faster! Because superhero business waits for no one!
> Double your ladybugs! Double your level coins!
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> Eww. Ladybug does NOT appreciate other bugs cluttering the streets of Paris. We exterminated them all!
> Stay up to date on all of our awesome games! Like us at Facebook.com/TabTale

> Even heroes deserve a treat! How about a sweet daily reward, just for you?
> Why choose, when you can have it all? Get our limited-time special offer: Hero Bundle Pack!

> We defeated the gross bugs for you. Now do your part, and go defeat the evil supervillains! The Parisians are counting on you!
> Show your love for Ladybug by giving us a 5-star rating!

> Guess what, you miraculous players, you? We’ve got a new character for you: Queen Bee/ Chloe! At a special price, since it’s holiday season :-)
> Jingle bells, jingle bells, heroes save the day! Get into the Xmas spirit with our festive new holiday decorations.
> Our magical new Paris scene will make you swoon. Update now to enjoy “Rooftops at Night.”

> Guess what, you miraculous players, you? We’ve got a new character for you: Queen Bee/ Chloe! At a special price, since it’s holiday season :-)
> Jingle bells, jingle bells, heroes save the day! Get into the Xmas spirit with our festive new holiday decorations.
> Bug fixes.

> Jingle bells, jingle bells, heroes save the day! Get into the Xmas spirit with our festive new holiday decorations.
> Show your love for Ladybug by giving us a 5-star rating!

> We defeated the gross bugs for you. Now do your part, and go defeat the evil supervillains! The Parisians are counting on you!
> Show your love for Ladybug by giving us a 5-star rating!

> Our magical new Paris scene will make you swoon. Update now to enjoy “Rooftops at Night.”
> We made some minor game changes that will make a major difference to your gameplay! Now your game will be super smooth so you can concentrate on showing those villains who’s boss!
> Looking for more supercool games? Stay up to date on the latest games, at Facebook.com/TabTale

> Okay, okay! We heard you! Carapace is here, miraculously greener and tougher than ever.
> We brought you all the characters, now the rest is up to you! Choose your favorite hero and go save Paris!
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> Infinity level improvements! All the environments are now available!
> We made some minor game changes that will make a major difference to your gameplay! Now your game will be super smooth so you can concentrate on showing those villains who’s boss!

> Exclusively for subscribers - hidden VIP levels & secret missions! Are you good enough to discover them?
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> Bugs, bugs, go away. Come again another day! (No, not YOU, Ladybug! You’re kinda the whole point of our game…)
> Game improvements for a smoother experience.

> You like butterflies? Who doesn’t?! Great news: you can collect those beauties while running. Starting now!
> Improved character animations, to keep you amazed over and over again!
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> Bug Control - We sprayed some more bugs... eww!
> Improvements for better game performance.

> New obstacles and new animations! Are you excited?
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> New obstacles and new animations! Are you excited?
> Give Ladybug the 5-star rating you know she deserves.

> We defeated the gross bugs for you. Now do your part, and go defeat the evil supervillains! The Parisians are counting on you!
> Show your love for Ladybug by giving us a 5-star rating!

> Happy Birthday, you Miraculous Players!
> This awesome game is already 1 year old! Amazing how time flies when you’re saving the world…
> A birthday surprise is waiting for you in this festive update, go get it!

> Bug Control - We sprayed some more bugs... eww!
> Improvements for better game performance.

> Eww. Ladybug does NOT appreciate other bugs cluttering the streets of Paris. We exterminated them all!
> Stay up to date on all of our awesome games! Like us at Facebook.com/TabTale

> Bugs, bugs, go away. Come again another day! (No, not YOU, Ladybug! You’re kinda the whole point of our game…)
> Game improvements for a smoother experience.

> Everybody wants to get inside Adrien’s mansion… now YOU get to run all over it and complete missions. Just don’t let Adrien’s father catch you running on his precious tables…!
> Some minor bug fixes, because we love you.

It's going to be such a Miraculous Christmas…!
Please welcome Luka (aka Viperion, the coolest hero around!)
You can now run as Luka and Viperion and save Paris!
It’s winter outside and Paris is FROZEN! Run in the frozen streets, can you handle all the new obstacles?!

> NEW CHARACTER ADDED! Play as Alix Kubdel, the reckless, tough, pink-haired tomboy, and turn into super-cool BunnyX!
> Bug fixes to make for smooth running.

> We made some minor game changes that will make a major difference to your gameplay! Now your game will be super smooth so you can concentrate on showing those villains who’s boss!
> Looking for more supercool games? Stay up to date on the latest games, at Facebook.com/TabTale

> NEW CHARACTER ADDED! Play as Alix Kubdel, the reckless, tough, pink-haired tomboy, and turn into super-cool BunnyX!
> Bug fixes to make for smooth running.
This update is a piece of art! Are you ready to run, jump and complete missions inside the Louvre?! Spots on!

It's going to be such a Miraculous Christmas…!
Please welcome Luka (aka Viperion, the coolest hero around!)
You can now run as Luka and Viperion and save Paris!
It’s winter outside and Paris is FROZEN! Run in the frozen streets, can you handle all the new obstacles?!
Bugs fixes for undisturbed hours of fun.
Game performance is now smoother than ever. Play on!
Bug fixes for better game playing
Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Who knew quarantine could be so fun?!
Wanna put a smile on your face during these tough times? Download this update to get a miraculous gift, from us to you.
C’mon, be a hero - keep your loved ones safe and sound, stay home… and PLAY!

Can you feel the excitement in the air?! Maybe it’s because we have a NEW CHARACTER!
That’s right, Miraculous players - we’re happy and honored to give you Kagami (aka Superhero Ryuko).
Now you can run with both sward-savvy Kagami and lightning-speedy Ryuko, and save Paris. Play your super hearts out!
Bug fixes for smoother playing
New update. Smoother game. Lots of fun!
Bug fixes for smoother playing

Gameplay improvements.
Some improvements and bug control.

It's going to be such a Miraculous Christmas…!
It’s winter outside and Paris is FROZEN! Run in the frozen streets, can you handle all the new obstacles?!

Hi there Miraculous players are you ready to fall in love with this update?!
For this Valentine we decided to surprise you.
Save Paris with our NEW Heroes: Lady Noir and Mister Bug!
Confused? Well then you must try this out!

Can you feel the excitement in the air?! Maybe it’s because we have a NEW CHARACTER
That’s right, Miraculous players - we’re happy and honored to give you King Monkey (aka Le Chien Kim).
Now you can run with both, and save Paris.
Play your super hearts out!

NEW CHARACTER Alert
Guess who’s joining Miraculous Ladybug and Cat Noir?! You’ll probably recognize him by his ability to open portals and magic Horseshoe - Yes, it’s Pegasus
So what are you waiting for? Play your super hearts out

Want some bugs with your game? Didn’t think so. We’ve been on a bug-killing spree.
This game just got even more addictive. Check out the improved gameplay!
Bugs fixes for undisturbed hours of fun
